remarks: A composition of two relations is empty iff there is no overlap betwen the range of the second and the domain of the first.  Useful in combination with ~ coundi and ~ coundir to prune meaningless terms in the result. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 8-Oct-2014.)
statement: coeq0 $p |- ( ( A o. B ) = (/) <-> ( dom A i^i ran B ) = (/) ) $.
